pr_title: Adjust resizable queue lower bounds to align with the default capacity(200/1000) suggested by ES

timeline.message: Adjust resizable queue lower bounds to align with the default capacity(200/1000) in ES
Update ITs to reflect changes made for queue capacity lower bounds

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to add all of these configurations? Wont just changing the default queue lower bounds suffice?
timeline.author: vigyasharma

replies.bodyText: We don't have to add all configurations in the rca conf but I remember Joydeep once asked me to explicitly add all rca conf into the file so that people who are not familiar with the settings can easily understand and set it
replies.author: rguo-aws
